description: The Sawtooth X Mid Waterproof is like a supreme pizza for your feet—it has all the fixings. From its mid height for added support to its Adaptive Cushioning Technology midsole for a smooth ride to its B-DRY waterproof and breathable technology, it has it all. Now all that is left to do is dial up your plans for the trail.
name: Oboz Sawtooth X Mid B-Dry, Wide - Mens

specs.value: LWG gold certified oiled nubuck, Cordura Fabric mesh, TPU heel counter, B-DRY Waterproof Membrane, 100% RPET Repreve Laces, 100% RPET Repreve Webbing, Micro-injected PU window underlay
Rubber-blended adaptive foam, TPU Shank, Heel puck
